text: A. I. M. Mostofa Reza Nur () is a former Lieutenant General of Bangladesh Army and former Principal Staff Officer, head of the Armed Forces Division. ==Career== Nur was commission in the Bangladesh Army on 11 January 1975. From 2004 to 2006, he served as the Principal Staff Officer, head of the Armed Forces Division. 6 April 2006 he was appointed the Ambassador of Bangladesh to Kuwait. He served as the ambassador till 3 June 2008. Nur is a member of Baridhara DOHS Parishad. He participated in the Prime Bank Cup Golf Tournament in 2015 and won the hole in one competition. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladesh Army generals Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Principal Staff Officers (Bangladesh) Category:Ambassadors of Bangladesh to Kuwait
title: A. I. M. Mostofa Reza Nur
